Never Before Heard Sounds

Never Before Hear Soundsâ€™ real-time hardware does timbre transformations on the sounds of a performer. This application of machine learning uses pre-trained models to automatically change, for example, what instrument it sounds like is being played.

Learn more about it on their website.
